data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
A person facing forward cannot always walk forward. To point you in the right direction and point you in the left direction is to make a backwards circle. So, the answer is Yes.

If you always face forward you will always be facing forward. There will be 1 step left. if you take 4 steps forward the second step will be the same as the first one. if you take 6 steps forward the third step will be the same as the previous one. So, the answer is no.
